title: Show HN: Bracket – selfhosted tournament system
summary: The text describes a self-hosted tournament system called Bracket, which was developed by the user tripleseven. The system is open source and has a significant amount of features, including flexible setups and the ability to host multiple stages with multiple items. The backend is written in async Python with FastAPI and the frontend is in Next.js with the Mantine library. The user is looking for feedback on the system and is open to suggestions for improvement.
